long_description: glassroots art show is a trade show designed for glass artists and industry companies who wish to do wholesale business with shops, galleries, and resellers. since 2009, glassroots has stayed true to its roots focusing on glass as the star of the show and helping to elevate and provide a platform for the working artist, mom & pop, and family owned and operated businesses to create lifelong relationships with buyers and stores throughout the midwest and beyond. we envision the best intentions for new beginnings, happy changes, positive growth and the same old camaraderie as ever for the future of the show under waldo's lead.
business_tags: art showings | trade show design | shopping & galleries | hotels & stays | trade show flooring | galleries & shows | talk shows | wholesale | functional glass
generated_description: glassroots art show, legally known as glassroots art show llc., based in madison, wisconsin, is a trade show that features american-made functional glass art from glassblowers and industry companies across the united states. established in 2009, the company focuses on providing a platform for glass artists, mom-and-pop businesses, and family-owned enterprises to connect with shops, galleries, and resellers. glassroots art show aims to elevate the work of its artists and help them build lifelong relationships with buyers and stores in the midwest and beyond.
